I want to retrieve all conversations from HubSpot chat via api , I already read <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversations/conversations#inboxes> documentation but how to get inboxid and channelid? also I have a developer account with HubSpot, I think before using apis like conversations/v3/conversations/inboxes , we need to authorize it right? could you please let me know step by step procedure in doing this?

HI anyone can help me I am using woocomerce to add products in WordPress. but I have a problem with connectivity shiprocket to HubSpot I am unable to fetch {deal updated data} at realtime with AWB number so please support me to resolve the issue
